title: QA Meta: Prompt Corpus â€” Tabular & Grid Extraction
author: Struct QA
subject:
Table/Grid Commands:
- Extract any table-like content as an array of rows.
- For W-9 TIN cells, emit per-cell coordinates and digits.
- Include `col_headers` if detected; else null.
- Preserve row order; include page numbers for each row.
creator: QA Generator v4.0

custom.prompts_guardrails: If no tables present, set `tables: []` (do not invent).
custom.eval_criteria: Cell order accuracy; exact digit-to-box mapping; stable coordinates.
